page.title: 08Children's Games
page.content:
Lots of people like{rollerskating in my school. We also like to play {cricket}and{soft tennis}with a special foam ball.{Netball}is a game played mostly by girls but sometimes by boys. The boys prefer playing {football}and many children like playing{rounders.}Some children also play{badminton}outside in the summertime.
At school we have indoor games if it rains at playtime. We like to play {Chess, Draughts, Connect Four, City {Lotto}and{Whot.}At home a few people like to play{Monopoly}and all sorts of card games.
At the school we all like to make dens out of sticks and stones and some leaves. We build these among the trees and rock outcrops.
